com.jgcomptech.tools.permissions

Class PermissionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jgcomptech.tools.events.EventTarget<PermissionEvent>
      • com.jgcomptech.tools.permissions.PermissionManager

  • public final class PermissionManager
extends EventTarget<PermissionEvent>
    Manages permissions to be used to enable or disable parts of your application.
    Since:
    1.4.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PermissionManager.SystemPermissions
      A list of the implemented permission types.
